Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base

Class ErsapFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base.ErsapFilters
  • public final class ErsapFilters
extends java.lang.Object
    The standard filters to select ERSAP DPEs, containers or services.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • allDpes

        public static DpeFilter allDpes()
        Returns a filter to select all DPEs in the ERSAP cloud. The filter will select every running DPE, of any language.
        Returns:
        a filter for all DPEs

      • allContainers

        public static ContainerFilter allContainers()
        Returns a filter to select all containers in the ERSAP cloud. The filter will select every deployed container, in every DPE, of any language.
        Returns:
        a filter for all containers

      • allServices

        public static ServiceFilter allServices()
        Returns a filter to select all services in the ERSAP cloud. The filter will select every deployed service, in every container of every DPE, of any language.
        Returns:
        a filter for all services

      • dpesByHost

        public static DpeFilter dpesByHost​(java.lang.String host)
        Returns a filter to select all the DPEs of the given host. A host can contain multiple DPEs of different languages. The filter will select all DPEs running in the specified host.

        Example: all the DPEs on the host 10.2.9.100.

        Parameters:
        host - the selected host
        Returns:
        a filter for all DPEs in the host

      • dpesByLanguage

        public static DpeFilter dpesByLanguage​(ErsapLang lang)
        Returns a filter to select all the DPEs of the given language. The filter will select every running DPE of the specified language.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all DPEs of the given language

      • containersByHost

        public static ContainerFilter containersByHost​(java.lang.String host)
        Returns a filter to select all the containers of the given host. A host can contain multiple DPEs of different languages. The filter will select all containers deployed on every DPE running in the specified host.

        Example: all the containers on the host 10.2.9.100.

        Parameters:
        host - the selected host
        Returns:
        a filter for all containers in the host

      • containersByDpe

        public static ContainerFilter containersByDpe​(DpeName dpeName)
        Returns a filter to select all the containers of the given DPE. A host can contain multiple DPEs of different languages. The filter will select every container deployed on the specified DPE.

        Example: all the containers on the DPE 10.2.9.100_cpp.

        Parameters:
        dpeName - the selected DPE
        Returns:
        a filter for all containers in the DPE

      • containersByLanguage

        public static ContainerFilter containersByLanguage​(ErsapLang lang)
        Returns a filter to select all the containers of the given language. The filter will select all containers deployed on every running DPE of the specified language.

        Example: all the java containers.

        Parameters:
        lang - the language to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all containers of the given language

      • containersByName

        public static ContainerFilter containersByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a filter to select all the containers of the given name. The filter will select every container deployed on any running DPE whose name matches the specified name. The match must be exact.

        Example: all containers named master.

        Parameters:
        name - the container name to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all containers with the given name

      • servicesByHost

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByHost​(java.lang.String host)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given host. A host can contain multiple DPEs of different languages. The filter will select all services deployed on every DPE running in the specified host.

        Example: all the services on the host 10.2.9.100.

        Parameters:
        host - the selected host
        Returns:
        a filter for all services in the host

      • servicesByDpe

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByDpe​(DpeName dpeName)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given DPE. A host can contain multiple DPEs of different languages. The filter will select every service deployed on the specified DPE.

        Example: all the services on the DPE 10.2.9.100_cpp.

        Parameters:
        dpeName - the selected DPE
        Returns:
        a filter for all services in the DPE

      • servicesByContainer

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByContainer​(ContainerName containerName)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given container. The filter will select every service deployed on the specified container.

        Example: all the services on the container 10.2.9.100_cpp:master.

        Parameters:
        containerName - the selected container
        Returns:
        a filter for all services in the container

      • servicesByLanguage

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByLanguage​(ErsapLang lang)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given language. The filter will select all services deployed on every running DPE of the specified language.

        Example: all the java services.

        Parameters:
        lang - the language to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all services of the given language

      • servicesByName

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given name. The filter will select every service deployed on any running DPE whose engine matches the specified name. The match must be exact.

        Example: all services named SqrRoot.

        Parameters:
        name - the engine name to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all services of the given name

      • servicesByAuthor

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByAuthor​(java.lang.String authorName)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given author. The filter will select every service deployed on any running DPE whose author matches the specified name. The match must be exact.

        Example: all services developed by John Doe.

        Parameters:
        authorName - the author name to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all services by the given author

      • servicesByDescription

        public static ServiceFilter servicesByDescription​(java.lang.String regex)
        Returns a filter to select all the services of the given description. The filter will select every service deployed on any running DPE whose description matches the specified regular expression.

        Example: all services with the regex in its description.

        Parameters:
        regex - the engine name to filter
        Returns:
        a filter for all services by a matching description
